      • title

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder title(@NonNull
                                     String title)
        Sets title of the live event. This must not be null.
        Parameters:
        title - title

      • synopsis

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder synopsis(String synopsis)
        Sets synopsis of the live event.
        Parameters:
        synopsis - synopsis

      • listed

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder listed(boolean listed)
        Sets if the live event should be listed. Default value is true.
        Parameters:
        listed - should the live event be listed

      • category

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder category(Integer category)
        Sets category id of the live event.
        Parameters:
        category - category id

      • highestResolution

        @Deprecated
public LiveEventConfig.Builder highestResolution(Resolution resolution)
        Deprecated. use profile(Profile) instead.
        Sets the highest resolution of the live event. Default value is Resolution._720p.
        Parameters:
        resolution - highest resolution

      • profile

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder profile(Profile profile)
        Sets the profile of the live event. {360p,720p,720p_and_source,1080p_and_source} Note: 1080p_and_source can only be used when the account is enabled highest resolution 1080p authority. Default value is Profile._720P.
        Parameters:
        profile - profile of the live event

      • vodListed

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder vodListed(boolean listed)
        Set whether to list the new vod of this live event. Default value is false.
        Parameters:
        listed - true if you want the new vod listed

      • vodAvailable

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder vodAvailable(boolean available)
        Set whether the new vod of this live event is available by users. Default value is false.
        Parameters:
        available - true if you want the new vod available by users

      • vodMerge

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder vodMerge(boolean merge)
        Set whether to merge all VoDs of the live event together. If this field is enabled, only one VoD is generated and there is no temporary VoD is shown until the live event ends. This field can't be changed after the live event is created. Default value: false.
        Parameters:
        merge - true if you want to merge all VoDs of the live event together

      • dvrEnabled

        public LiveEventConfig.Builder dvrEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set whether to enable live DVR feature for a live event. Default value: false.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true if you want to enable live DVR feature for a live event

      • build

        public LiveEventConfig build()
        Creates a LiveEventConfig by this builder.
